00002 #include "../headers/rpdb.h"
00003 
00004 /*
00005 
00006 ## GENERAL INFORMATION
00007 ##
00008 ## FILE                                         rpdb.c
00009 ## AUTHORS                                      P. Schmidtke and V. Le Guilloux
00010 ## LAST MODIFIED                        01-04-08
00011 ##
00012 ## SPECIFICATIONS
00013 ##
00014 ##  PDB utilities, mainly reading routines. Not all information are stored,
00015 ##  this reader is specific to fpocket, and essentially deals with ATOMS,
00016 ##  HETATMS and several other fields.
00017 ##
00018 ##
00019 ##  Curently:
00020 ##              - Hydrogens present in the PDB are kept
00021 ##              - HETATM are ignored except for specific cofactor, small molecule... 
00022 ##                listed in ST_keep_hetatm variable, and for a  given ligand, defined by 
00023 ##                its resname.
00024 ##              - Solvent molecules are ignored
00025 ##
00026 ##      The reading process stop at the end of the file or as soon as the END flag
00027 ##      is reached.
00028 ##
00029 ##  We used VMD as a base for the code developpement, but now codes are quite
00030 ##  differents... 
00031 ##
00032 ## MODIFICATIONS HISTORY
00033 ##
00034 ##  17-03-09    (v)  Improved atom type guessing
00035 ##  10-03-09    (v)  Atom type guessed using resname when element symbol is missing
00036 ##  11-02-09    (v)  Added list of pointer on all atoms (usefull for sorting)
00037 ##  22-01-09    (p)  Eliminate double entries in the cofactor list
00038 ##      19-01-09        (v)  Open pdb file checking the case
00039 ##  28-11-08    (v)  Comments UTD + minor corrections
00040 ##  20-11-08    (p)  Adding support of reading PDB multiple occupancies (only 
00041 ##                                       the first is read) & MSE added to kept HETATM list
00042 ##      03-11-08        (v)  Code slightly restructured, comments added
00043 ##      01-04-08        (v)  Added template for comments and creation of history
00044 ##      01-01-08        (vp) Created (random date...)
00045 ##      
00046 ## TODO or SUGGESTIONS
00047 ##
00048 ##      (v) Improve element guessing by checking resname.
00049 ##
00050 
00051 */
00052 
00053

00088         "BPB", "BCL", "BCB", "COB",  "ZN", "FEA", "FEO", "H4B", "BH4", "BHS",

00091         "HF5", "NFS", "OMO", "PHF", "SF3", "SF4", "CFM", "CFN", "CLF", "CLP",

00100 static const int ST_nb_keep_hetatm = 105 ; /**<  number of residue types to keep*/

00102 /**
00103    ## FUNCTION: 
00104         rpdb_extract_pdb_atom
00105   
00106    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00107         Extract all information given in a pdb ATOM or HETATM line, and store them 
00108         in given pointers. User must therefore provide enough memory in parameter.
00109         PDB last known standart:
00110 
00111         COLUMNS      DATA TYPE        FIELD      DEFINITION
00112         
00113         1 -  6      Record name      "ATOM    "
00114         7 - 11      Integer          serial     Atom serial number.
00115         13 - 16      Atom             name       Atom name.
00116         17           Character        altLoc     Alternate location indicator.
00117         18 - 20      Residue name     resName    Residue name.
00118         22           Character        chainID    Chain identifier.
00119         23 - 26      Integer          resSeq     Residue sequence number.
00120         27           AChar            iCode      Code for insertion of residues.
00121         31 - 38      Real(8.3)        x          Orthogonal coordinates for X in 
00122                                                                                          Angstroms
00123         39 - 46      Real(8.3)        y          Orthogonal coordinates for Y in 
00124                                                                                          Angstroms
00125         47 - 54      Real(8.3)        z          Orthogonal coordinates for Z in 
00126                                                                                          Angstroms
00127         55 - 60      Real(6.2)        occupancy  Occupancy.
00128         61 - 66      Real(6.2)        tempFactor Temperature factor.
00129         77 - 78      LString(2)       element    Element symbol, right-justified.
00130         79 - 80      LString(2)       charge     Charge on the atom.
00131 
00132   
00133    ## PARAMETRES:
00134         @ char *pdb_line        : The PDB line containings info
00135         @ int *atm_id           : Pointer to atom ID
00136         @ char *name            : Pointer to atom name
00137         @ char *res_name        : Pointer to residue name
00138         @ char *chain           : Pointer to chain name
00139         @ char *seg_name        : Pointer to segment    
00140         @ int *res_id           : Pointer to residue ID
00141         @ char *insert          : Pointer to insertion code
00142         @ char *alt_loc         : Pointer to alternate location
00143         @ char *elem_symbol     : Pointer to element symbol
00144         @ float *x, *y, *z      : Pointer to coordinates
00145         @ float *occ            : Pointer to occupency
00146         @ float *bfactor        : Pointer to b-factor
00147         @ char *symbol          : Pointer to symbol
00148         @ float *bfactor        : Pointer to charge
00149         @ int guess_flag        : Flag if elements were guessed
00150   
00151    ## RETURN:
00152         void
00153   
00154 */
00155 
00156 void rpdb_extract_pdb_atom( char *pdb_line, char *type, int *atm_id, char *name, 
00157                                                         char *alt_loc, char *res_name, char *chain, 
00158                                                         int *res_id, char *insert, 
00159                                                         float *x, float *y, float *z, float *occ, 
00160                                                         float *bfactor, char *symbol, int *charge, int *guess_flag)
00161 {
00162 /* Position:          1         2         3         4         5         6 */
00163 /* Position: 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 */
00164 /* Record:   ATOM    145  N   VAL A  25      32.433  16.336  57.540  1.00 */
00165 
00166 /* Position: 6         7         8 */
00167 /* Position: 012345678901234567890 */
00168 /* Record:   0 11.92           N   */
00169 
00170         int rlen = strlen(pdb_line) ;
00171 
00172         char *prt,
00173                  ctmp ;
00174 
00175         /* Record type */
00176         strncpy(type, pdb_line, 6) ;
00177 
00178         /* Atom ID */
00179         prt = pdb_line + 6 ; 
00180         ctmp = pdb_line[11] ; pdb_line[11] = '\0' ;
00181         *atm_id = atoi(prt) ; pdb_line[11] = ctmp ;
00182         
00183         /* Atom name */
00184         strncpy(name, pdb_line + 12, 4);
00185         name[4] = '\0';
00186         str_trim(name) ;
00187 
00188         /* Alternate location identifier */
00189         *alt_loc = pdb_line[16] ;
00190         
00191         /* Residue name */
00192         rpdb_extract_atm_resname(pdb_line, res_name) ;
00193 
00194         /* Chain name */
00195         chain[0] = pdb_line[21];
00196         chain[1] = '\0';
00197 
00198         /* Residue id number */
00199         prt = pdb_line + 22 ; 
00200         ctmp = pdb_line[26] ; pdb_line[26] = '\0' ;
00201         *res_id = atoi(prt) ; pdb_line[26] = ctmp ;
00202 
00203         /* Insertion code */
00204         *insert = pdb_line[26];
00205 
00206         /* x, y, and z coordinates, occupancy and b-factor */
00207         rpdb_extract_atom_values(pdb_line, x, y, z, occ, bfactor);
00208 
00209         /* Atomic element symbol (if does not exists, guess it based on
00210          * atom name */
00211         if (rlen >= 77) {
00212                 strncpy(symbol, pdb_line + 76, 2);
00213                 symbol[2] = '\0';
00214                 str_trim(symbol); /* remove spaces */
00215                 if(strlen(symbol) < 1) {
00216                         guess_element(name, symbol) ;
00217                         *guess_flag+=1;
00218                 }
00219         }
00220         else {
00221                 guess_element(name, symbol) ;
00222                 *guess_flag+=1;
00223         }
00224         str_trim(symbol); /* remove spaces */
00225         
00226         /* Charge */
00227         if(rlen >= 79) {
00228             char buf[4] = "   " ;
00229                 if((pdb_line[78] == ' ' && pdb_line[79] == ' ') || pdb_line[78] == '\n'){
00230                         *charge = 0 ;
00231                 }
00232                 else {
00233                         buf[0] = pdb_line[78] ;
00234                         buf[1] = pdb_line[79] ;
00235                         buf[2] = '\0' ;
00236                         *charge = (int) atoi(buf) ;
00237                 }
00238         }
00239         else *charge = 0 ;
00240         
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00244 /**
00245    ## FUNCTION:
00246         guess_element
00247   
00248    ## SPECIFICATION:
00249         Guess the element of the atom based on atom name. The pattern matched here
00250         have been taken from the MOE PDB reader.
00251 
00252         ' CL#' => Chlorine (use El field if it matches ' @@?' && HETATAM)
00253         CH2T from CT !!! => what not
00254 
00255         const AtomPatterns = [
00256           N:'[A-G,I-L,N-Z]N#*',
00257           O:['[A-B,D-G,I-L,N-Z]O*','OP[A-C]#','CO[A-Z,0-9]*','OE##'],
00258           P:'[A-G,I-K,M-N,P-Z]P*',
00259           C:['[A-G,I-Z]C#*','C[B-G,I-K,M,P-T,V-Z]#*','#CH#', 'BC  '],
00260           H:['H[0-9,A-E,H-Z]*','#[0-9,A-Z]H*','?H[A-Z,0-9]*', 'HG##'],
00261           CL:'#CL#',        // check this
00262           S:'[P,N]S#*',
00263           SE:'NSE1'
00264         ];
00265   
00266    ## PARAMETRES:
00267         @ char *atom_name       : The atom name
00268         @ char *res_name        : OUTPUT the element guessed
00269   
00270    ## RETURN:
00271         void (element is the output)
00272   
00273 */
00274 void guess_element(char *aname, char *element)
00275 {
00276         /* Use a temporary variable for atomname, mainly to remove spaces */
00277         char tmp[strlen(aname)+1] ;
00278         strcpy(tmp, aname) ;
00279         
00280         str_trim(tmp) ;
00281 
00282         char *ptmp = tmp ;
00283 
00284         /* Move to the second caracter if we find a number */ 
00285         if(isdigit(tmp[0])) {
00286             ptmp = ptmp+1 ;
00287         }
00288         else {
00289             element[0] = ' ';
00290             element[1] = ptmp[0] ;
00291             element[2] = '\0';
00292             return;
00293         }
00294         /* Check if its a valid element */
00295         int index = is_valid_element(ptmp, 1) ;
00296         if(index != -1) {
00297                 strcpy(element, ptmp );
00298                 return ;
00299         }
00300 
00301         /* Here we have a special case... So take the first and second */
00302         element[0] = ' ';
00303         element[1] = ptmp[0] ;
00304         element[2] = '\0';
00305 }
00306 
00307 int is_N(char *aname)
00308 {       /* N:'[A-G,I-L,N-Z]N#*' */
00309 
00310         if(aname[0] == 'N' && isdigit(aname[1])) return 1 ;
00311         if( aname[0] != 'H' && aname[0] != 'M' && aname[1] == 'N'
00312                         && str_is_number(aname, 0)) return 1 ;
00313 
00314         return 0 ;
00315 }
00316 
00317 int is_O(char *aname)
00318 {
00319 /*
00320           O:['[A-B,D-G,I-L,N-Z]O*','OP[A-C]#','CO[A-Z,0-9]*','OE##']
00321 */
00322         if(aname[0] == 'O') {
00323                 /* TESTING     'OP[A-C]#' */
00324                 if( aname[1] == 'P' && (aname[2] == 'A' || aname[2] == 'B' || aname[2] == 'C')
00325                         && isdigit(aname[3])) {
00326                         return 1 ;
00327                 }
00328 
00329                 /* TESTING     'OE##' */
00330                 if(aname[1] == 'E' && isdigit(aname[2]) && isdigit(aname[3])) return 1 ;
00331         }
00332         else {
00333                 /* TESTING     '[A-B,D-G,I-L,N-Z]O*' */
00334                 if( aname[0] != 'C' && aname[0] != 'H' && aname[0] != 'M' && aname[1] == 'O')
00335                         return 1 ;
00336 
00337                 /* TESTING     'CO[A-Z,0-9]*' */
00338                 if(aname[0] == 'C' && aname[1] == 'O' && aname[2] != ' ' && aname[3] != ' ')
00339                         return 1 ;
00340         }
00341 
00342         return 0 ;
00343 }

00345 /**
00346    ## FUNCTION: 
00347         rpdb_extract_atm_resname
00348   
00349    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00350         Extract the residu name for an ATOM or HETATM pdb record. To remember:
00351 
00352         COLUMNS      DATA TYPE        FIELD      DEFINITION
00353         
00354         18 - 20      Residue name     resName    Residue name.
00355 
00356         The memory to store the name has to be provided by the user.
00357   
00358    ## PARAMETRES:
00359         @ char *pdb_line        : The PDB line containings info
00360         @ char *res_name        : Pointer to residue name
00361   
00362    ## RETURN:
00363         void
00364   
00365 */
00366 void rpdb_extract_atm_resname(char *pdb_line, char *res_name)
00367 {
00368 /* Position:          1         2         3         4         5         6 */
00369 /* Position: 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 */
00370 /* Record:   ATOM    145  N   VAL A  25      32.433  16.336  57.540  1.00 */
00371 
00372 /* Position: 6         7         8 */
00373 /* Position: 012345678901234567890 */
00374 /* Record:   0 11.92           N   */
00375         
00376 /* Residue name */
00377         strncpy(res_name, pdb_line + 17, 4);
00378         res_name[4] = '\0';
00379         /*str_trim(res_name); */
00380 }
00381 
00382 /**
00383    ## FUNCTION: 
00384         rpdb_extract_atom_values
00385   
00386    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00387         Extract coordinates, occupancy and bfactor values from a pdb ATOM or HETATM
00388         line, and store them in given pointers.
00389   
00390    ## PARAMETRES:
00391         @ char *pdb_line        : The PDB line containings info
00392         @ float *x, *y, *z      : Pointer to coordinates
00393         @ float *occ            : Pointer to occupency
00394         @ float *bfactor        : Pointer to b-factor
00395   
00396    ## RETURN: void
00397   
00398 */
00399 void rpdb_extract_atom_values(char *pdb_line, float *x, float *y, float *z,
00400                                                           float *occ, float *bfactor) 
00401 {
00402 /* Position:          1         2         3         4         5         6 */
00403 /* Position: 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 */
00404 /* Record:   ATOM    145  N   VAL A  25      32.433  16.336  57.540  1.00 */
00405 
00406 /* Position: 6         7         8 */
00407 /* Position: 012345678901234567890 */
00408 /* Record:   0 11.92           N   */
00409         
00410         char *ptr,
00411                  ctmp ;
00412         
00413         ptr = pdb_line + 30 ;
00414         ctmp = pdb_line[38] ; pdb_line[38] = '\0' ;
00415         *x = (float) atof(ptr) ; pdb_line[38] = ctmp ;
00416 
00417         ptr = pdb_line + 38 ;
00418         ctmp = pdb_line[46] ; pdb_line[46] = '\0' ;
00419         *y = (float) atof(ptr) ; pdb_line[46] = ctmp ;
00420 
00421         ptr = pdb_line + 46 ;
00422         ctmp = pdb_line[54] ; pdb_line[54] = '\0' ;
00423         *z = (float) atof(ptr) ; pdb_line[54] = ctmp ;
00424 
00425         ptr = pdb_line + 54 ;
00426         ctmp = pdb_line[60] ; pdb_line[60] = '\0' ;
00427         *occ = (float) atof(ptr) ; pdb_line[60] = ctmp ;
00428         
00429         ptr = pdb_line + 60 ;
00430         ctmp = pdb_line[66] ; pdb_line[66] = '\0' ;
00431         *bfactor = (float) atof(ptr) ; pdb_line[66] = ctmp ;
00432 }
00433 
00434 /**
00435    ## FUNCTION: 
00436         rpdb_extract_cryst1
00437   
00438    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00439         Extract information on a box size from a pdb CRYSTL line, and store them 
00440         in given pointers.
00441   
00442    ## PARAMETRES:
00443         @ char *pdb_line                                : The PDB line containings info
00444         @ float *alpha, *beta, *gamma   : Pointer to angles
00445         @ float *A, B, C                                : Pointer sides length
00446   
00447    ## RETURN: void
00448   
00449 */
00450 void rpdb_extract_cryst1(char *pdb_line, float *alpha, float *beta, float *gamma, 
00451                                                  float *a, float *b, float *c) 
00452 {
00453 /* Position:          1         2         3         4         5         6 */
00454 /* Position: 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 */
00455 /* Record:   ATOM    145  N   VAL A  25      32.433  16.336  57.540  1.00 */
00456 
00457 /* Position: 6         7         8 */
00458 /* Position: 012345678901234567890 */
00459 /* Record:   0 11.92           N   */
00460 
00461         char ch, *s;
00462         
00463         s = pdb_line+6 ;
00464         ch = pdb_line[15] ; pdb_line[15] = '\0' ;
00465         *a = (float) atof(s) ;
00466 
00467         s = pdb_line+15 ;
00468         *s = ch ; ch = pdb_line[24]; pdb_line[24] = '\0' ;
00469         *b = (float) atof(s) ;
00470 
00471         s = pdb_line+24 ;
00472         *s = ch; ch = pdb_line[33]; pdb_line[33] = '\0' ;
00473         *c = (float) atof(s) ;
00474 
00475         s = pdb_line+33;
00476         *s = ch; ch = pdb_line[40]; pdb_line[40] = '\0' ;
00477         *alpha = (float) atof(s) ;
00478 
00479         s = pdb_line+40;
00480         *s = ch; ch = pdb_line[47]; pdb_line[47] = '\0' ;
00481         *beta = (float) atof(s) ;
00482 
00483         s = pdb_line+47;
00484         *s = ch; ch = pdb_line[54]; pdb_line[54] = '\0' ;
00485         *gamma = (float) atof(s) ;
00486 }

00489 /**
00490    ## FUNCTION: 
00491         rpdb_open
00492   
00493    ## SPECIFICATION:
00494         Open a PDB file, alloc memory for all information on this pdb, and store 
00495         several information like the number of atoms, the header, the remark... 
00496         This first reading of PDB rewinds the FILE* pointer. No coordinates are
00497         actually read.
00498 
00499         Hydrogens are conserved.
00500         All HETATM are removed, except the given ligand if we have to keep it, and
00501         important HETATM listed in the static structure at the top of this file.
00502   
00503    ## PARAMETRES:
00504         @ const char *fpath    : The pdb path.
00505         @ const char *ligan    : Ligand resname.
00506         @ const char *keep_lig :  Keep the given ligand or not?
00507   
00508    ## RETURN: 
00509         s_pdb: data containing PDB info.
00510   
00511 */
00512 s_pdb* rpdb_open(char *fpath, const char *ligan, const int keep_lig)
00513 {
00514         s_pdb *pdb = NULL ;
00515 
00516         char buf[M_PDB_BUF_LEN],
00517                  resb[5] ;
00518         
00519         int nhetatm = 0,
00520                 natoms = 0,
00521                 natm_lig = 0 ;
00522         int i ;
00523         
00524         pdb = (s_pdb *) my_malloc(sizeof(s_pdb)) ; ;
00525         
00526         /* Open the PDB file in read-only mode */
00527         pdb->fpdb = fopen_pdb_check_case(fpath, "r");
00528         if (!pdb->fpdb) {
00529                 my_free(pdb) ;
00530                 fprintf(stderr, "! File %s does not exist\n", fpath) ;
00531                 return NULL ;
00532         }
00533 
00534         while(fgets(buf, M_PDB_LINE_LEN + 2, pdb->fpdb)) {
00535                 if (!strncmp(buf, "ATOM ",  5)) {
00536                 /* Check if this is the first occurence of this atom*/
00537                         if(buf[16]==' ' || buf[16]=='A'){  
00538                         /* Atom entry: check if there is a ligand in there (just in case)... */
00539                                 rpdb_extract_atm_resname(buf, resb) ;
00540                                 if( ligan && ligan[0] == resb[0] && ligan[1] == resb[1] 
00541                                         && ligan[2] == resb[2]){
00542 
00543                                         if(keep_lig) {
00544                                                 natm_lig ++ ;
00545                                                 natoms++ ;
00546                                         }
00547                                 }
00548                                 else {
00549                                         natoms++ ;
00550                                 }
00551                         }
00552                 }
00553                 else if(!strncmp(buf, "HETATM", 6)) {
00554                         /*Check again for the first occurence*/
00555                         if(buf[16]==' ' || buf[16]=='A'){ 
00556                                 /* Hetatom entry: check if there is a ligand in there too... */
00557                                 rpdb_extract_atm_resname(buf, resb) ;
00558                                 if( keep_lig && ligan && ligan[0] == resb[0] && ligan[1] == resb[1] 
00559                                         && ligan[2] == resb[2]){
00560                                         natm_lig ++ ; natoms++ ;
00561                                 }
00562                                 else {
00563                                 /* Keep specific HETATM given in the static list ST_keep_hetatm */
00564                                         for(i = 0 ; i < ST_nb_keep_hetatm ; i++) {
00565                                                         if(ST_keep_hetatm[i][0] == resb[0] && ST_keep_hetatm[i][1]
00566                                                                 == resb[1] && ST_keep_hetatm[i][2] == resb[2]) {
00567                                                                         nhetatm++ ; natoms++ ;
00568                                                                         break ;
00569                                                         }
00570                                         }
00571                                 }
00572                         }
00573                 }
00574 /*
00575                 else if (!strncmp(buf, "HEADER", 6)) 
00576                         strncpy(pdb->header, buf, M_PDB_BUF_LEN) ;
00577 */
00578                 
00579                 else if (!strncmp(buf, "END", 3)) break ;
00580         }
00581 
00582         if (natoms == 0) {
00583                 fprintf(stderr, "! File '%s' contains no atoms...\n", fpath) ;
00584                 my_free(pdb) ;
00585         
00586                 return NULL ;
00587         }
00588 
00589         /* Alloc needed memory */
00590         pdb->latoms = (s_atm*) my_calloc(natoms, sizeof(s_atm)) ;
00591         pdb->latoms_p = (s_atm**) my_calloc(natoms, sizeof(s_atm*)) ;
00592 
00593         if(nhetatm > 0) pdb->lhetatm = (s_atm**) my_calloc(nhetatm, sizeof(s_atm*)) ;
00594         else pdb->lhetatm = NULL ;
00595         
00596         if(natm_lig > 0) pdb->latm_lig = (s_atm**) my_calloc(natm_lig, sizeof(s_atm*)) ;
00597         else pdb->latm_lig = NULL ;
00598         
00599         pdb->natoms = natoms ;
00600         pdb->nhetatm = nhetatm ;
00601         pdb->natm_lig = natm_lig ;
00602         rewind(pdb->fpdb) ;
00603 
00604         return pdb ;
00605 }
00606 
00607 /**
00608    ## FUNCTION: 
00609         rpdb_read
00610   
00611    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00612         Read and store information on atoms for a pdb file.
00613     Curently:
00614                 - Hydrogens present in the PDB are kept
00615                 - HETATM are ignored except for specific cofactor, small molecule... 
00616                   listed in ST_keep_hetatm variable, and for a  given ligand, defined by 
00617                   its resname.
00618                 - Solvent molecules are ignored
00619   
00620    ## PARAMETRES:
00621         @ s_pdb *pdb           : The structure to fill
00622         @ const char *ligand   : The ligand resname
00623         @ const char *keep_lig :  Keep the given ligand or not?
00624   
00625    ## RETURN:
00626   
00627 */
00628 void rpdb_read(s_pdb *pdb, const char *ligan, const int keep_lig) 
00629 {
00630         int i,
00631                 iatoms,
00632                 ihetatm,
00633                 iatm_lig,
00634                 ligfound ;
00635 
00636         char pdb_line[M_PDB_BUF_LEN],
00637                  resb[5] ;                                      /* Buffer for the current residue name */
00638 
00639         s_atm *atom = NULL ;
00640         s_atm *atoms = pdb->latoms ;
00641         s_atm **atoms_p = pdb->latoms_p ;
00642         s_atm **atm_lig = pdb->latm_lig ;
00643         int guess_flag=0;
00644         iatoms = 0 ;
00645         ihetatm = 0 ;
00646         iatm_lig = 0 ;
00647         ligfound = 0 ;
00648 
00649         /* Loop over the pdb file */ 
00650         while(fgets(pdb_line, M_PDB_LINE_LEN + 2, pdb->fpdb)) {
00651                 if (strncmp(pdb_line, "ATOM ",  5) == 0) {
00652                         if(pdb_line[16]==' ' || pdb_line[16]=='A'){ /*if within first occurence*/
00653                                 /* Store ATOM entry */
00654                                 rpdb_extract_atm_resname(pdb_line, resb) ;
00655                                 /* Check if the desired ligand is in such entry */
00656                                 if( ligan && ligan[0] == resb[0] && ligan[1] == resb[1] 
00657                                         && ligan[2] == resb[2]){
00658                                         if(keep_lig) {
00659                                                 atom = atoms + iatoms ;
00660                                                 
00661                                                 /* Read atom information */
00662                                                 rpdb_extract_pdb_atom(pdb_line, atom->type, &(atom->id), 
00663                                                                 atom->name, &(atom->pdb_aloc), atom->res_name, 
00664                                                                 atom->chain, &(atom->res_id), &(atom->pdb_insert), 
00665                                                                 &(atom->x), &(atom->y), &(atom->z), 
00666                                                                 &(atom->occupancy), &(atom->bfactor), atom->symbol,
00667                                                                 &(atom->charge), &guess_flag);
00668 
00669                                                 /* Store additional information not given in the pdb */
00670                                                 atom->mass = pte_get_mass(atom->symbol) ;
00671                                                 atom->radius = pte_get_vdw_ray(atom->symbol) ;
00672                                                 atom->electroneg = pte_get_enegativity(atom->symbol) ;
00673                                                 atom->sort_x = -1 ;
00674                                                 
00675                                                 atoms_p[iatoms] = atom ;
00676                                                 iatoms++ ;
00677 
00678                                                 atm_lig[iatm_lig] = atom ;
00679                                                 iatm_lig ++ ;
00680                                                 ligfound = 1 ;
00681                                         }
00682                                 }
00683                                 else {
00684                                 /* A simple atom not supposed to be stored as a ligand */
00685                                         atom = atoms + iatoms ;
00686                                         rpdb_extract_pdb_atom(pdb_line, atom->type, &(atom->id), 
00687                                                         atom->name, &(atom->pdb_aloc), atom->res_name, 
00688                                                         atom->chain, &(atom->res_id), &(atom->pdb_insert), 
00689                                                         &(atom->x), &(atom->y), &(atom->z), &(atom->occupancy), 
00690                                                         &(atom->bfactor), atom->symbol, &(atom->charge), &guess_flag);
00691 
00692                                         /* Store additional information not given in the pdb */
00693                                         atom->mass = pte_get_mass(atom->symbol) ;
00694                                         atom->radius = pte_get_vdw_ray(atom->symbol) ;
00695                                         atom->electroneg = pte_get_enegativity(atom->symbol) ;
00696                                         atom->sort_x = -1 ;
00697 
00698                                         atoms_p[iatoms] = atom ;
00699                                         iatoms++ ;
00700                                 }
00701                         }
00702                 }
00703                 else if(strncmp(pdb_line, "HETATM", 6) == 0) {
00704                         if(pdb_line[16]==' ' || pdb_line[16]=='A'){/*first occurence*/
00705                                 /* Check HETATM entry */
00706                                 rpdb_extract_atm_resname(pdb_line, resb) ;
00707                                 /* Check if the desired ligand is in HETATM entry */
00708                                 if( ligan && keep_lig && ligan[0] == resb[0] && ligan[1] == resb[1] 
00709                                         && ligan[2] == resb[2]){
00710 
00711                                         atom = atoms + iatoms ;
00712                                         rpdb_extract_pdb_atom(pdb_line, atom->type, &(atom->id), 
00713                                                         atom->name, &(atom->pdb_aloc), atom->res_name, 
00714                                                         atom->chain, &(atom->res_id), &(atom->pdb_insert), 
00715                                                         &(atom->x), &(atom->y), &(atom->z), &(atom->occupancy), 
00716                                                         &(atom->bfactor), atom->symbol, &(atom->charge), &guess_flag);
00717 
00718                                         /* Store additional information not given in the pdb */
00719                                         atom->mass = pte_get_mass(atom->symbol) ;
00720                                         atom->radius = pte_get_vdw_ray(atom->symbol) ;
00721                                         atom->electroneg = pte_get_enegativity(atom->symbol) ;
00722                                         atom->sort_x = -1 ;
00723 
00724                                         atoms_p[iatoms] = atom ;
00725                                         atm_lig[iatm_lig] = atom ;
00726                                         
00727                                         iatm_lig ++ ; iatoms++ ;
00728                                         ligfound = 1 ;
00729                                 }
00730                                 else if(pdb->lhetatm) {
00731                                 /* Keep specific HETATM given in the static list ST_keep_hetatm. */
00732                                         for(i = 0 ; i < ST_nb_keep_hetatm ; i++) {
00733                                                 if( ST_keep_hetatm[i][0] == resb[0] && ST_keep_hetatm[i][1] 
00734                                                         == resb[1] && ST_keep_hetatm[i][2] == resb[2]) {
00735                                                         atom = atoms + iatoms ;
00736                                                         rpdb_extract_pdb_atom(pdb_line, atom->type, &(atom->id), 
00737                                                                         atom->name, &(atom->pdb_aloc), atom->res_name, 
00738                                                                         atom->chain, &(atom->res_id), &(atom->pdb_insert), 
00739                                                                         &(atom->x), &(atom->y), &(atom->z), 
00740                                                                         &(atom->occupancy), &(atom->bfactor), 
00741                                                                         atom->symbol, &(atom->charge), &guess_flag);
00742 
00743                                                 /* Store additional information not given in the pdb */
00744                                                         atom->mass = pte_get_mass(atom->symbol) ;
00745                                                         atom->radius = pte_get_vdw_ray(atom->symbol) ;
00746                                                         atom->electroneg = pte_get_enegativity(atom->symbol) ;
00747                                                         atom->sort_x = -1 ;
00748                                                         
00749                                                         atoms_p[iatoms] = atom ;
00750                                                         pdb->lhetatm[ihetatm] = atom ;
00751                                                         ihetatm ++ ; iatoms++ ;
00752                                                         break ;
00753                                                 }
00754                                         }
00755                                 }
00756                         }
00757                 }
00758                 else if (strncmp(pdb_line, "CRYST1",  6) == 0)  {
00759                         rpdb_extract_cryst1(pdb_line, &(pdb->alpha), &(pdb->beta), &(pdb->gamma),
00760                                                                          &(pdb->A),  &(pdb->B), &(pdb->C));
00761                 }
00762                 else if (!strncmp(pdb_line, "END", 3)) break ;
00763         }
00764 
00765        
00766         if(guess_flag>0) {
00767             fprintf(stderr, ">! Warning: You did not provide a standard PDB file.\nElements were guessed by fpocket, because not provided in the PDB file. \nThere is no guarantee on the results!\n");
00768         }
00769         
00770         if(ligan && keep_lig && (ligfound == 0 || pdb->natm_lig <= 0)) {
00771                 fprintf(stderr, ">! Warning: ligand '%s' not found in the pdb...\n", ligan) ;
00772                 if(pdb->latm_lig) fprintf(stderr, "! Ligand list is not NULL however...\n") ;
00773                 if(ligfound == 1) fprintf(stderr, "! And ligfound == 1!! :-/\n") ;
00774         }
00775         else if(ligfound == 1 && iatm_lig <= 0) {
00776                 fprintf(stderr, ">! Warning: ligand '%s' has been detected but no atoms \
00777                                                 has been stored!\n", ligan) ;
00778         }
00779         else if((ligfound == 1 && pdb->natm_lig <= 0) || (pdb->natm_lig <=0 
00780                          && iatm_lig > 0)) {
00781                 fprintf(stderr, ">! Warning: ligand '%s' has been detected in rpdb_read \
00782                                                 but not in rpdb_open!\n", ligan) ;
00783         }
00784 
00785 }
00786 
00787 /**
00788    ## FUNCTION: 
00789         free_pdb_atoms
00790   
00791    ## SPECIFICATION:
00792         Free memory for s_pdb structure
00793   
00794    ## PARAMETRES:
00795         @ s_pdb *pdb: pdb struct to free
00796   
00797    ## RETURN:
00798         void
00799   
00800 */
00801 void free_pdb_atoms(s_pdb *pdb) 
00802 {
00803         if(pdb) {
00804                 if(pdb->lhetatm) {
00805                         my_free(pdb->lhetatm) ;
00806                         pdb->lhetatm = NULL ;           
00807                 }
00808                 if(pdb->latoms) {
00809                         my_free(pdb->latoms) ;
00810                         pdb->latoms = NULL ;
00811                 }
00812                 if(pdb->latm_lig) {
00813                         my_free(pdb->latm_lig) ; 
00814                         pdb->latm_lig = NULL ;
00815                 }
00816                 if(pdb->fpdb) {
00817                         fclose(pdb->fpdb) ;
00818                         pdb->fpdb = NULL ;      
00819                 }
00820                 
00821                 if(pdb->latoms_p) {
00822                         my_free(pdb->latoms_p) ;
00823                         pdb->latoms_p = NULL ;
00824                 }
00825 
00826                 my_free(pdb) ;
00827         }
00828 }
